description.value: On closer inspection, a gibbering mouther's saliva appears to be a mixture of saliva from various creatures. The saliva has a sharp acidic smell that is so strong it burns the eyes and nose. Use: As an action, the vial of saliva can be thrown up to 20 feet. The vial explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the mouther's next turn.
